    • processStatistics

      public static GradeStatisticsUtil.StatisticsResult processStatistics(CourseDetail courseDB, StudentScore studentScoreDB, QuizDetail quizDB, String selectedCourse, String selectedExam, String selectedStudent)
      Processes statistics for selected course, exam, and student
      Parameters:
      courseDB - The course database instance
      studentScoreDB - The student score database instance
      quizDB - The quiz database instance
      selectedCourse - The selected course name
      selectedExam - The selected exam name
      selectedStudent - The selected student name
      Returns:
      StatisticsResult containing processed statistics

    • processQuizStatistics

      quizDB - The quiz database instance

    • processStudentScore

      public static void processStudentScore(String student, String course, String exam, int fullScore, List<Question> questions, StudentScore studentScoreDB, GradeStatisticsUtil.StatisticsResult result, Map<String,Double> examScores, String xLabel)
      Processes score for an individual student
      Parameters:
      student - The student name
      course - The course name
      exam - The exam name
      fullScore - The full score possible
      questions - List of questions in the exam
      studentScoreDB - The student score database instance
      result - The statistics result object to update
      examScores - Map of exam scores
      xLabel - Label for the x-axis
